summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5985 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 1, Wilcox's Addition, being the alley between North 78th Street and North 79th Street, from Ashworth Avenue to approximately 305 feet west thereof; and certain other alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 80117, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
